text: The Netherlands Antilles competed in the Winter Olympic Games for the first time at the 1988 Winter Olympics in Calgary, Alberta, Canada. ==Bobsleigh== {|class="wikitable" border="1" style="font-size:90%" |- !rowspan="2"|Sled !rowspan="2"|Athletes !rowspan="2"|Event !colspan="2"|Run 1 !colspan="2"|Run 2 !colspan="2"|Run 3 !colspan="2"|Run 4 !colspan="2"|Total |- !Time !Rank !Time !Rank !Time !Rank !Time !Rank !Time !Rank |- |align="center"|AHO-1 |Bart Carpentier Alting Bart Drechsel |Two-man |align="center"|59.60 |align="center"|30 |align="center"|1:00.78 |align="center"|27 |align="center"|1:01.95 |align="center"|32 |align="center"|1:01.40 |align="center"|31 |align="center"|4:03.73 |align="center"|29 |} == Luge== ;Men {|class="wikitable" border="1" style="font-size:90%" |- !rowspan="2"|Athlete !colspan="2"|Run 1 !colspan="2"|Run 2 !colspan="2"|Run 3 !colspan="2"|Run 4 !colspan="2"|Total |- !Time !Rank !Time !Rank !Time !Rank !Time !Rank !Time !Rank |- |Bart Carpentier Alting |align="center"|50.802 |align="center"|37 |align="center"|53.468 |align="center"|37 |align="center"|53.501 |align="center"|35 |align="center"|52.142 |align="center"|35 |align="center"|3:29.913 |align="center"|36 |} ==References== *Official Olympic Reports * Olympic Winter Games 1988, full results by sports- reference.com Category:Nations at the 1988 Winter Olympics 1988 Winter Olympics Oly
